info.title: Info
info.description: Chiosco Il Tempio is open all year round with seasonal hours:

seasons.may_sept: May to September: open every day from 9:00 to 24:00.
seasons.oct: October: open every day from 9:00 to 21:00.
seasons.nov: November: open from 10:00 to 18:00, every day.
seasons.jan_feb: January - February: open only in good weather.
seasons.mar_apr: March - April: open from 9:00 to 21:00, unless the weather is bad.

info.footer: A reference point for those looking for a moment of relaxation in a green space in central Florence.
info.booking: To organize graduation parties, it's possible to book tables by calling the following number:
